attributes.title: This app ruined my life🤮🤢
attributes.review: The trump administration in general just ruined my life. I literally had to go to the counselors office at school because thinking about how this is our president, would make me so anxious. Enough said.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: Absolutely awful, took days to download only to not work and let me log in!! Don’t recommend, trash app, awful quality and overall just not happy with the app. 🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: When I opened the app it said that Donald trump stole my kazoo and to get it back i would have to pay a small loan of 1 million dollars then it said spike and showed a picture of my broken kazoo  rip jimmy

attributes.title: This app was terrible and had no use
attributes.review: I’m disgusted on how useless this app is 🧚🏾 I’ve never on a more boring and no use app . This 🧟❤️ app belongs in a garbage can 🖤  and is literally the opposite of useful ☮️. I think you get the point 💟

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: This app is so awful DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! It took days to download and slowed my phone way down then when I went to delete it it took another like five days to delete It: This app is absolutely terrible.

attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: This is for a fact the worst app in the entire world. It hacked my phone and started showing me weird videos of people with goat heads. The government is trying to hack our minds and I landed in the mental hospital because of this stupid app🤮

attributes.title: Don’t download!!
attributes.review: I downloaded it and it gave me a virus. I was hacked on multiple platforms afterwards. My phone locked up and wouldn’t unlock for three hours afterwards. It’s a scam! All my information was compromised!

attributes.title: Actually takes up 20gb’s
attributes.review: I can’t even use my phone anymore, it took the rest of my available space and won’t uninstall! Don’t download!

attributes.title: TRASH!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took 2 weeks to download, plus it gave me 15 different VIRUSES on my phone😡😡😡😡 i’m very disappointed and i hope nobody else downloads this app and has the same horrible experience that i did

attributes.title: This app took all of my information 😔
attributes.review: I cant long into anything all of my social media platforms has been hacked because of this app also it’s very glitchy not a good app 🙍‍♀️
